website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, basic electric cooktop that features 4 radiant elements controlled by knobs that are located on the right of the unit.
pros: GE's 30-inch black cooktop has a sleek, modern design with a minimum of controls which makes it intuitive to use
It is easy to clean and features a power boil setting as well as a warm setting to accommodate all your cooking needs
cons: The cooktop is slightly shy of 30 inches, so if you're using this as a replacement, you may run into a little difficulty

customer_reviews.title: and has been awesome to use
customer_reviews.text: When our cooktop died I was torn on buying another glass one because the one that came with our place was all scratched up, and these have a reputation for scratching. But so far, it hasn't scratched at all, and has been awesome to use. The power boil is great, and we've had no issues with it. It was easy to install, easy enough to clean, and I love that it has knobs instead of buttons - that was a 'must' for me since I didn't want to push a button 10 times to get to the highest heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Good cooktop. Performs as it should
customer_reviews.text: Good cooktop. Performs as it should. Exceeded our expectations on speed of delivery and ease of installation. The heat on these smooth cooktops is kind of hard to control, and it shows fingerprints and any drop of anything that gets on it. But it is fairly easy to clean, which is good, because it needs cleaning frequently. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John  Atkerson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great at a great price.  Get it.
customer_reviews.text: It's great and a great buy. Inherited an expensive name plate stove-top that didn't work right anymore. Factory rep quoted $ 900 to repair, or @2,000 to replace. Got this for $400, looks the same, boils the same water and cooks the same stew. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard C. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this junk.... I bought it year ago and one of 8” burner stopped running, I did not mind it as I had another 8” to keep me rolling. But, now yesterday the other 8” gone and I am now left with 2 stoves which are 6” ( candles, lol) ....don’t know what to do to cover over $400 I spend just March last year!! Terrible experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Dhillon

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Knobs a little cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. I read the reviews about the white lines coming off but I have had no problem with it. Probably because I use the recommended cleaner (daily!) which doesn't scrape or damage the stovetop. Only small issue is how cheap the knobs look. This can be fixed with purchasing new stainless steel or higher quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mari K.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The big burner is off center as you can see by the picture. I paid an electrician to run 220v to the kitchen as it only has a 120v. Now, 3 hour later, after he runs the electricity needed and installs the cooktop just to find out it’s defective. So dissatisfied. I was expecting more from a GE product. Now, I’ll have to return it and pay the electrician for an extra trip.
customer_reviews.author: loren

customer_reviews.title: I'll not recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective unit. If I turn on one of the burners, surrounding surface of cooktop up to 6-8" away will get VERY HOT. So hot that it will burn my hand if I touch the surface for over a second. Mind you, this is touching surface 6"-8" away from edge of the burner that's on. I'll not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooktop to replace and older one in a mobile home. the hole in the top of the counter was very close to being to big for the stove, luckily there was a gasket around the inside edge of the counter that allowed the cook top to rest, but if it was not there, I would have had to do some wood work to give the cooktop something to rest on. overall excellent though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You pay 400+ for a new cooktop and you get a used/return one.
customer_reviews.text: When you pay 400+ for a new cooktop, you would hope get get a new one. Instead we received a used/return one. Again always check your product before installing. The electrical wire was cut shorter. The housing on the cooktop was all scratched up and the glass was separating from the housing on one corner. Bad quality control on the part of Amazon for sending us a used unit, it was great that they were able to refund our money.
customer_reviews.author: walking encyclopedia

customer_reviews.title: It heats your food
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. 2 wires + ground and you’re done. Gets dirty quick, but relatively easy to clean. Wish it was able to hold temps, but I guess that’s the downside of electric. Nice cooktop for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts for one year - then goes haywire
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 14 months and now it is full blast no matter what setting you choose. Suggest to choose another one.
customer_reviews.author: John Lavin

customer_reviews.title: hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I always looks dirty if you even look at it, it will get dirty lol but it works and went in easy did not get the trim kit because it was 100.00 dont really need one for that price hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: debra kay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived a day early in perfect condition. This product fit the cutout for a previously installed Jenn Air cooktop. Once installed, everything functioned designed. This cooktop looks attractive in all black finish with black burner dials. Excellent price point for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: If you tend to cook for an army like I do
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but largest burner is only 9 inches and I have a lot of larger pans and it just doesn't work well for them. If you tend to cook for an army like I do, spend the money and invest in one with a 9/12 burner in the front, it will be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Belina

customer_reviews.title: Working Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Installation would have been very easy, but my granite countertops weren't cut to a perfect square so they corners on the cooktop caught on them. had to carefully chip them down. After that it went in easily. Have had it about a month and it is working perfectly. We have had a glass cooktop before so we realized that things can burn on the cooktop if spilled which can take a little work to clean. Looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lester L. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate measurement
customer_reviews.text: Product is described as 30 inch cooktop. Its a little bit shy of the 30 inches. Just fair warning if choosing this cooktop don’t cut your hole for a 30 inch. I had been without a stove for a week then to find out it didn’t fit. The company was great about the return though.
customer_reviews.author: Meh...

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I had a GE glass top for 15 years and I dropped something on it and it broke. The replacement cost for the glass alone was 400.00. Bought this item for 383.00, seemed like a no brainer to me. Can't speak to much since I just purchased it and not sure how it will perform long term but it does work and it looks sleek, and the cost was better than any appliance store around town (even with Memorial Day sales).
customer_reviews.author: Runner Guy

customer_reviews.title: 1 burner broken. By the time I realized the ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 burner broken. By the time I realized the return window was over. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my broken one ok
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Comes with new seals to put between appliance and counter top. The glass top seems to collect a lot more burned on stuff, like soup overboil, than our old same product and harder to clean off. The hotter settings aren’t very hot except full heat.
customer_reviews.author: Pork barrel

customer_reviews.title: Crappy quality. Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Glass developed hairline cracks after less than 6 months use. Not covered by warranty. Burners work either too hot or too little heat, i.e. poor heat control.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Basic Simple Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The product is everything it claimed to be. Very easy to install. Purchased as a replacement for a Kenmore model same size. It fit, as claimed into the same opening. Complete replacement time, including prep and clean up was 2 hours. It has worked just fine with no problems. The model is a basic model without all the unnecessary bells and whistles. It’s really all you need. Read reviews from others who purchased, including the negative ones, and can honestly say that I believe a rating of 5 is justified.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Polis

customer_reviews.title: Stove Overall Review
customer_reviews.text: There's isnt much to complain about the item. It's easy to install if you know what to do. So far the item is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Magnus Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new cooktop bad. Very easy to set up and install. Slowly upgrading the new house and imidiatly makes the kitchen more usable as the old cocktop took a half hour to heat up. This is pretty much turn on 5 seconds and ready to go. Instant heat. Very efficient too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Easy instal, and seems like a nice cooktop. But why on earth would you put a large sticker on a glass cooktop?! Ever tried to get a sticker off glass?!! Have some common sense!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this flat stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful it only has a small scratch on the back
customer_reviews.author: Benita Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooktop stove
customer_reviews.text: Good stove. If burners were 3100Watts it would have been nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Bra

customer_reviews.title: Same product carried by Box Stores for less
customer_reviews.text: Way less than Box stores and worked great. An exact match to what I had for 20 years. Only reason I'm replacing is because we remodeled the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: rjk

customer_reviews.title: After installation the left side burners didn't work, checked ...
customer_reviews.text: After installation the left side burners didn't work, checked into warranty info, warranty seemed as if a service tech had to come out to repair, decided to take cover off and have a look inside myself and found a connector not connected (poor quality control it seemed)after reconnecting all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was replacing another cook top. This fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing another cook top. This fit in perfectly. Installation took 30 minutes. I prefer the knob controls to the touch. Touch controls were temperature sensitive. Many times I would need to chill my hands to turn on a burner.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our kitchen remodel.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad my son suggested this stovetop while we were remodeling our kitchen recently. It looks very classy and is such a huge improvement from the old one. It cleans easily and really gives the countertop a chic look. Heats up quickly, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Bridgwood

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product Shipped
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work after instillation and Amazon directed me to the Manufacturer to address the problem. Terrible service.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I bought it to replace my old stove top. Which had been in use for 52 years. Hope this new one last that long
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: ... boil - will only very very low boil at best and that takes a long time - need help ...
customer_reviews.text: having issues with power boil - will only very very low boil at best and that takes a long time - need help with this product
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: ... couple meals on it now and I think it's great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked a couple meals on it now and I think it's great so far. Hopefully it lasts a long time. Excellent price and shipped quick!
customer_reviews.author: John Barron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t seem to function correctly on the left rear element. It doesn’t seem to be able to regulate to variable temp. It seems to only stay on the highest setting no matter the selection on the dial. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: pat mckennon

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller footprint for our cooktop and this GE was perfect. The seller was great and we are very ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a smaller footprint for our cooktop and this GE was perfect. The seller was great and we are very happy with this purchase. I would recommend this cooktop to anyone looking for a nice range at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great albeit slow to warm up.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and easy install. You'll need some patience for items to warm up but when it does all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last one
customer_reviews.text: The stovetop is very slow to warm up and not very hot even then
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Mcmurtry

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than the one we replaced but still nice, no frills
customer_reviews.author: APRIL

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with all appliances
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it that long but it works great, goes with all makes of appliances and my husband hooked it up himself. It was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: exceptional
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the cooktop, 10 stars for amazon services
customer_reviews.author: Bill's girl lucy

customer_reviews.title: nice cooktop, however the cooktop eyes are close together ...
customer_reviews.text: nice cooktop, however the cooktop eyes are close together which makes it impossible to have 2 large pots next to each other at the same time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: It died almost exactly 2 yrs after install. Sure it was used every day but it should last longer than 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money, without compromise
customer_reviews.text: In this price range this is one of the only cooktops that features 5 full-function burners. (Most have only 4 full-function burners plus one "warming" burner.) The Rapid Boil burner does a great job of bringing temperature up fast. The surface is easy to clean and looks great when using a cooktop-specific cleaner such as Cerama Bryte.
customer_reviews.author: PJ1

customer_reviews.title: Unit shorted out in less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked well until it didn't. I'm going to try and get in touch with Amazon/or retailer to see if I can get a replacement -- so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: easy to install , fast heat up ,black is simply a challenge to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: jerry dupree

customer_reviews.title: Burner failure
customer_reviews.text: Although they do offer a 1 year warranty (from purchase date) I bought this product as part of an upcoming kitchen remodel. It set in the garage for ~6 months while we saved for the project. Tonight a burner wen't out. HUGE flash btw. I bought it 1 year and 1 week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Marcom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of installation, complete instructions and hardware. Product packing excellent. All around great stovetop, can’t go wrong with GE
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Di Emidio

customer_reviews.title: Exclpr2011@gmail.com
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the exact same model as I had 11 years ago.unfortuntly it is not the same size.my hole in my counter is bigger and I have to redo my counter top to fit the new one .i exspected it to be the same size. Cost me a lot of work to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated
customer_reviews.text: It's been in a week works well so far the last GE cooktop lasted over 27 years!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: We have had the stove top for 4 years and the only complaint is that it is very hard to keep shinny
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I ordered, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: Although its dimension lists 30 inches but it's just 29 ...
customer_reviews.text: Although its dimension lists 30 inches but it's just 29 and 3-quarter inches. I wish they could list precise dimensions. Because of a-quarter inch short, it brought a tremendous problem to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. K.

customer_reviews.title: not that durable
customer_reviews.text: Third in my aunt's house......the last one broken just after one year.....
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in previous GE stove cutout. Plug right in and go! Saved $200 buying online than in store.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: glass top become very hot while cooking
customer_reviews.text: the glass top while cooking becomes very hot right side by knobs
customer_reviews.author: clifford quast

customer_reviews.title: GE JP3030DJBB 30 Inch Smoothtop Electric Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and after installation, I am totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Barboza

customer_reviews.title: The other 3 are perfect
customer_reviews.text: When you look at the cooktop it has circles that heating elements are suppose to be in. The large one in front is way off center. The other 3 are perfect
customer_reviews.author: JGW3

customer_reviews.title: excellent cooktop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping,nice to have payment installments,installing was a breeze and I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Ge smooth rangetop
customer_reviews.text: Electrical connection is below bottom panel face. Requires extra clearance below it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product low price
customer_reviews.text: This is that I expect. Good product low price. Exactly same size that advertising says. Fits perfectly in a hole. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Salom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooktop. It is exactly as described and works perfectly. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dcrawl

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly as described and I was very pleased with the price savings over others I viewed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Was exactly as described and I was very pleased with the price savings over others I viewed. Looks great for our kitchen upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for six months and no complaints. Looks great, was easy to install. If you take care of your glass top stove, it looks great for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bertani

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD IT 8 MONTHS AND ONE OF THE BUNNERS IS ALREADY OUT, CANT CONTACT SELLER. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: JKAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our 10 year old cook top. This was easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC.

customer_reviews.title: Used junk
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously used. What a sham. Sent back ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Adds so much to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smooth top and sleek styling. The burners work great and the hot signal light is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mayn

customer_reviews.title: too small. wrong size. misleading!
customer_reviews.text: misleading size. said 30” was smaller and we had to send it back. wasted $75 on an install call.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our purchase. Have been using the new stovetop for just over two months now and it is working just fine. Clean look and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Not super hard to clean, but also not the easiest
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This came 1 day early, which was very helpful. I love cooking on it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rowland

customer_reviews.title: It looks great as and is super easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Because its black, you have to clean it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Skebbs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price,  very hard to keep clean, one burner out already
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price, very hard to keep clean, one burner out already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cook top and it looks good on my countertop
customer_reviews.author: robert d craft

customer_reviews.title: Silcuri@uol.com.br
customer_reviews.text: I installed one week ago and it not work well . What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: pensilvania

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but numbers and letters are hard to see ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but numbers and letters are hard to see on black surface.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: It was as expected but the place it was shipped from did a very poor job
customer_reviews.text: It is much easier to clean. We went electric and replaced a propane stove.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy. Will be using Amazon more often.
customer_reviews.author: joyce long

customer_reviews.title: Elements Never Turned Red
customer_reviews.text: This product is a disappointment. It take forever to heat up. I have had this product for over a month and never saw any of the elements turn red. I have to return it for a refund but it will cost me US$200 to ship it back to the States. So I'm stuck with it. Won't recommend this product to anyone. Too bad I know have a distasteful feel for GE products.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: I turned on my stove and it tripped a breaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I turned on my stove and it tripped a breaker. Reset the breaker, turned it on and it made a loud noise and Sparks were shooting out of the switch. I rarely used it as I use my crock- pot and electric frying pan for the most part. I feel it should be replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: installed and working fine. arrived as new
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, installed and working fine. arrived as new. box had hole in it but no internal damage. well packed. Just missing a couple brace mounting screws. had some in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but other than that works great for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Could heat up faster, but other than that works great for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific GE product
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. I do agree with others that this stove top is difficult to keep clean but overall I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love the stove and would have giving it a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before Christmas due to an old one going out and needed ASAP. Love the stove and would have giving it a 5 star but its really hard to keep clean. Shows finger prints and leaves streaks after you clean.
customer_reviews.author: kelzoi

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Quick heat up. Great value. $100 below the "Big Box" store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grreat! Drips and spills, if wiped up immediately ...
customer_reviews.text: Grreat! Drips and spills, if wiped up immediately, don't leave a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie from Phx,az

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong size I needed a 21 inch stovetop
customer_reviews.author: Therese Sauvageau

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Our old stovetop suddenly quit so I ordered this as a replacement. Although I have the tools and skills to change the hole size in the countertop I merely wanted something that would drop right in so we could stop using the camp stove on the front porch in 90 degree weather as soon as possible. This was a very easy installation and works well. I noticed several reviews said it was hard to keep clean and I find that also, compared to the older model of this same brand. It's not a major hassle but does require more than a simple wipe down with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my cooktop looks great in my new kitchen true to description works great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement fit.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to replace another GE 30" black electric glass top. Fit perfectly. Haven't used it long enough to know if it scratches more easily or not.
customer_reviews.author: Salad Dressing

customer_reviews.title: cook top
customer_reviews.text: nice unit, but terrible on the electric bill. I will probably replace it soon.
customer_reviews.author: lou murray

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly in the granite cutout and works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a gas cooktop with this 30" electric cooktop because a replacement gas cooktop was $899 and this was $399. We tried locally to get an electric cooktop but theirs was 1/2 all around too big and we could not cut the granite cutout to make it fit. That one went back. Locally this cooktop would take an additional 3-4 weeks to order. So I ordered it from Amazon and within 3 days it was at our door for our contractor to install. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Yor1lady

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit. Senseless Dimension!
customer_reviews.text: No manufacturer should ever sell a cooktop as a nominal 30" width when it measures 29.75". Oh, that appears in specs. but you don't always drill down. I wonder how many of these have come back for this reason. Returned. And I still don't have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: This could be the greatest stove on earth but who knows
customer_reviews.text: I dont know the quality of this product because it arrived all busted up. Shipping was a joke. This could be the greatest stove on earth but who knows. Returned and didn't reorder. Thats just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: dan freehill

customer_reviews.title: Giving it 1 star since it came in defective. ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 1 star since it came in defective. The right large element won't turn on and the hot element light stays on. I called GE hoping they could have somebody to come out and fix so that I don't have to do a return. They got me scheduled for service the next day but the service guy never bothered to show up. I just requested a return refund than deal with more hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jejay

customer_reviews.title: The cooktop would not fit the location.
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use the GE cooktop because it would not fit the location on the kitchen counter. I had to return it and find another cooktop that would fit the location.
customer_reviews.author: Kimsabi
